Update R packages from rpkg.dev

Source: R/salim.gen.R
update_rpkgs.Rd

Installs/updates R packages from rpkg.dev to the latest development version.

Usage

update_rpkgs(
  pkgs = c("pal", "pkgpins", "pkgpurl", "pkgsnip", "plotlee", "qstnr", "rstd",
    "swissmuni", "tocr", "yay")
)

Arguments

pkgs

R pkgs to be updated. A subset of:

  • "pal"

  • "pkgpins"

  • "pkgpurl"

  • "pkgsnip"

  • "plotlee"

  • "qstnr"

  • "rstd"

  • "swissmuni"

  • "tocr"

  • "yay"

Value

pkgs, invisibly.

See also

Other development environment currentness functions: lvl_up_quarto(), lvl_up_rstudio(), lvl_up_r(), update_salims_pkgs(), update_zdaarau_pkgs()
